iMARGI Pipeline
  • Docs »
  • bwa index

bwa index¶

docker run -v ~/research/MARGI_4DN/imargi_example:/imargi zhonglab/imargi bwa index \
    -p ./ref/bwa_index/bwa_index_GRCh38 ./ref/GRCh38_no_alt_analysis_set_GCA_000001405.15.fasta

Version: 0.7.17-r1194-dirty CMD: bwa index -p ./ref/bwa_index/bwa_index_GRCh38 ./ref/GRCh38_no_alt_analysis_set_GCA_000001405.15.fasta Real time: 4839.265 sec; CPU: 4822.200 sec

clean¶

time bash tools/imargi_clean_fastq.sh -1  raw_fastq/SRR8206679_1.fastq.gz -2 raw_fastq/SRR8206679_2.fastq.gz \
    -o output -t 16 -b 2000000

6101.94user 2459.60system 11:32.13elapsed 1236%CPU (0avgtext+0avgdata 32000maxresident)k 75975280inputs+85582640outputs (1major+417576335minor)pagefaults 0swaps

mapping¶

time bwa mem -t 16 -SP5M ./ref/bwa_index/bwa_index_GRCh38 \
    ./clean_fastq/clean_SRR8206679_1.fastq.gz ./clean_fastq/clean_SRR8206679_2.fastq.gz | \
    samtools view -@ 15 -Shb - >./output/HEK_iMARGI.bam

229676.05user 10590.82system 4:12:19elapsed 1586%CPU (0avgtext+0avgdata 9430528maxresident)k 96178192inputs+0outputs (0major+4909367983minor)pagefaults 0swaps
